name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: World Heritage Site
summary:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.

-Venice and its Lagoon
-Mont Saint-Michel and its Bay
-Machu Picchu
-Angkor
-Canadian Rocky Mountain Parks
-Great Barrier Reef
-Vatican City -St. Peter's Basilica-
-Yosemite National Park
-Itsukushima Shrine
-Sacred Sites and Pilgrimage Routes in the Kii Mt. Range
